Nightlight::

Nightlight saw Aerotaur. Why did she have the feeling that something 
isn't right?

"What do you think if we don't eat something?" said at last Nightlight

"I'm hungry.. " said Trinity while she waved her tail "I'm so hungry 
that... I could eat a Spaceship!!!!" 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He remembered Perplex's warning.  "Yes.  We would be glad to 
have you on 
> our team."  He could barely get the words out without having a 
panic attack.  
> But he refused to let his emotions show.
